bundle-gemfire-10-cluster-wan-app-grafan.title: GemFire Multi-Cluster Grafana Demo
bundle-gemfire-10-cluster-wan-app-grafan.description: This bundle demonstrates Grafana capabilities of monitoring five (5) GemFire clusters. It includes three (3) independent clusters and two (2) bi-directional WAN clusters along with a workflow simulator. ✏️ *This workspace bundle automatically installs the `grafana` app included in PadoGrid 1.0.2+ and supplemental scripts for driving the demo.* Please see [Release Notes](RELEASE_NOTES.md) for change logs.

bundle-gemfire-template.title: GemFire Bundle Template
bundle-gemfire-template.description: This bundle serves as a template for creating a new GemFire onlne bundle.
